Cylinder.cpp

1 #include <ros/ros.h>
2 #include <interactive_robot_hand/Cylinder.h>
3 #include <interactive_robot_hand/HandState.h>
4 #include <visualization_msgs/Marker.h>
5 #include <stdio.h>
6 
7 using namespace visualization;
8 
9 Cylinder::Cylinder() : Node() {
10 
11  // Create publisher and subscriber
12  publisher = nh.advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker>("/visualization_marker", 10);
13  eyes_sub = nh.subscribe<interactive_robot_hand::See>("/eyes/see", 1, &Cylinder::see, this);
14  hand_sub = nh.subscribe<interactive_robot_hand::HandState>("/hand/state", 1, &Cylinder::grip, this);
15 
16  // Set cylinder options
17  cylinder.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::CYLINDER;
18  cylinder.ns = "shapes";
19  cylinder.id = 0;
20  cylinder.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
21  cylinder.scale.x = 0.058;
22  cylinder.scale.y = 0.058;
23  cylinder.scale.z = 0.080;
24  cylinder.color.r = 0.350;
25  cylinder.color.g = 0.090;
26  cylinder.color.b = 0.100;
27  cylinder.color.a = 1.0;
28  cylinder.pose.position.x = 0.0;
29  cylinder.pose.position.y = 0.0;
30  cylinder.pose.position.z = 0.0;
31  cylinder.lifetime = ros::Duration();
32  cylinder.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
33  cylinder.header.frame_id = "/base_link";
34  free = true;
35 
36  // Wait for a subscriber on the /visualization_marker topic to make
37  // sure we only create the cylinder once rviz has actually started.
38  ros::Rate wait(1);
39  while(ros::ok() && publisher.getNumSubscribers() == 0) {
40  wait.sleep();
41  }
42 
43  // Create the cylinder
44  publisher.publish(cylinder);
45 
46  // Future updates should only modify the existing cylinder
47  cylinder.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::MODIFY;
48 
49 }
50 
51 Cylinder::~Cylinder() {
52 
53 }
54 
55 void Cylinder::see(const interactive_robot_hand::See::ConstPtr& message) {
56 
57  // Make the cylinder fade out if it is out of range
58  if(message->distance > 300.0 && message->distance < 400.0) {
59  cylinder.color.a = 1.0 - (message->distance-300.0)/100.0;
60  } else if(message->distance >= 400.0) {
61  cylinder.color.a = 0.0;
62  } else {
63  cylinder.color.a = 1.0;
64  }
65 
66  // Only update the cylinder to the real world position if it is free and not trapped
67  // in the hand, otherwise use a default distance of 55.0 mm
68  float position = 0.055;
69  if(free) {
70  position = message->distance / 1000.0;
71  }
72 
73  // Update the position in rviz
74  // The y position gets updated with a smoothing function based on the previous position
75  // and new position. This prevents noise from the sensor distance from making the cylinder
76  // move irratically.
77  cylinder.pose.position.y -= (cylinder.pose.position.y - (position)) / 2;
78  cylinder.header.frame_id = "/base_link";
79  cylinder.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
80  publisher.publish(cylinder);
81  ros::spinOnce();
82 
83 }
84 
85 void Cylinder::grip(const interactive_robot_hand::HandState::ConstPtr& hand_state) {
86 
87  // Set the cylinder free, allowing it to move, only if the hand is open
88  free = hand_state->open;
89 
90 }
91 
92 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
93  ros::init(argc, argv, "cylinder");
94  Cylinder cylinder;
95  cylinder.spin();
96  return 0;
97 }
